org.hornetq.jms.server

Interface HornetQJMSServerLogger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.jboss.logging.BasicLogger

    @MessageLogger(projectCode="HQ")
public interface HornetQJMSServerLogger
extends org.jboss.logging.BasicLogger
    Author:
    Andy Taylor 3/15/12 Logger Code 12 each message id must be 6 digits long starting with 12, the 3rd digit donates the level so INF0 1 WARN 2 DEBUG 3 ERROR 4 TRACE 5 FATAL 6 so an INFO message would be 121000 to 121999
